history.proof: intros H x y Hxy. unfold Coreflexive in *. shelve.

exceptions.tactic: intros A R2 R1 H x y Hxy.

exceptions.exn: Unable to apply lemma of type "forall x y : A, R2 x y -> x = y" on hypothesis of type "(R1 /\\ R2)%rel x y".

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
A: Type
R2: rel A A
R1: rel A A

Goal:
Coreflexive R2 -> Coreflexive (R1 /\ R2)

Premises:
Coreflexive = fun (A : Type) (R : relation A) => forall x y : A, R x y -> x = y : forall A : Type, relation A -> Prop Arguments Coreflexive {A}%type_scope _%rel_scope
rel = fun A1 A2 : Type => A1 -> A2 -> Prop : Type -> Type -> Type Arguments rel (_ _)%type_scope
rel_inter_corefl_l : forall R3 R4 : rel ?A ?A, Coreflexive R3 -> Coreflexive (R3 /\ R4) where ?A : [A : Type R1 : rel A A R2 : rel A A |- Type]
rel_union_corefl : forall R3 R4 : rel ?A ?A, Coreflexive R3 -> Coreflexive R4 -> Coreflexive (R3 \/ R4) where ?A : [A : Type R1 : rel A A R2 : rel A A |- Type]
sum_rel_corefl : forall (R3 : rel ?A ?A) (R4 : rel ?B ?B), Coreflexive R3 -> Coreflexive R4 -> Coreflexive (R3 + R4) where ?A : [A : Type R1 : rel A A R2 : rel A A |- Type] ?B : [A : Type R1 : rel A A R2 : rel A A |- Type]
prod_rel_corefl : forall (R3 : rel ?A ?A) (R4 : rel ?B ?B), Coreflexive R3 -> Coreflexive R4 -> Coreflexive (R3 * R4) where ?A : [A : Type R1 : rel A A R2 : rel A A |- Type] ?B : [A : Type R1 : rel A A R2 : rel A A |- Type]
subrel_eq : forall R : relation ?A, Coreflexive R -> Related R eq subrel where ?A : [A : Type R1 : rel A A R2 : rel A A |- Type]
arrow_refl : forall (RA : relation ?A) (RB : relation ?B), Coreflexive RA -> Reflexive RB -> Reflexive (RA ++> RB) where ?A : [A : Type R1 : rel A A R2 : rel A A |- Type] ?B : [A : Type R1 : rel A A R2 : rel A A |- Type]
rel_inter = fun (A B : Type) (R1 R2 : rel A B) (x : A) (y : B) => R1 x y /\ R2 x y : forall A B : Type, rel A B -> rel A B -> rel A B Arguments rel_inter {A B} (_ _)%rel_scope
subrel = fun (A B : Type) (R1 R2 : rel A B) => forall (x : A) (y : B), R1 x y -> R2 x y : forall A B : Type, rel (rel A B) (rel A B) Arguments subrel {A B}%type_scope (R1 R2)%rel_scope : rename
eq_corefl = fun (A : Type) (x y : A) (H : x = y) => H : forall A : Type, Coreflexive eq Arguments eq_corefl {A}%type_scope
list_rel_corefl = fun (A : Type) (R : relation A) (HR : Coreflexive R) (l1 l2 : list A) (Hl : list_rel R l1 l2) => list_rel_ind A A R (fun l3 l4 : list A => l3 = l4) (let H : A = A := eq_refl in (fun _ : A = A => eq_refl) H) (fun (x1 x2 : A) (Hx : R x1 x2) (l3 l4 : list A) (_ : list_rel R l3 l4) (IHl : l3 = l4) => let H : l3 = l4 := IHl in (let H0 : x1 = x2 := coreflexivity x1 x2 Hx in (let H1 : A = A := eq_refl in (fun (_ : A = A) (H3 : x1 = x2) (H4 : l3 = l4) => eq_trans (f_equal (fun f : list A -> list A => f l3) (eq_trans (f_equal (fun...
rel_union = fun (A B : Type) (R1 R2 : rel A B) (x : A) (y : B) => R1 x y \/ R2 x y : forall A B : Type, rel A B -> rel A B -> rel A B Arguments rel_union {A B} (_ _)%rel_scope
set_le_subrel = fun (A B : Type) (R1 R2 : rel A B) (HR : subrel R1 R2) (sA : A -> Prop) (sB : B -> Prop) (Hs : set_le R1 sA sB) (x : A) (Hx : sA x) => let e : exists b : B, sB b /\ R1 x b := Hs x Hx in match e with | ex_intro _ y (conj Hy Hxy) => ex_intro (fun b : B => sB b /\ R2 x b) y (conj Hy (HR x y Hxy)) end : forall A B : Type, Monotonic set_le (subrel ++> subrel) Arguments set_le_subrel {A B}%type_scope
rel_inter_refl : forall R3 R4 : rel ?A ?A, Reflexive R3 -> Reflexive R4 -> Reflexive (R3 /\ R4) where ?A : [A : Type R1 : rel A A R2 : rel A A |- Type]
subrel_impl_relim : forall (R3 R4 : rel ?A ?B) (x1 x2 : ?A) (y1 y2 : ?B) (P Q : Prop), RElim impl (R3 x1 y1) (R4 x2 y2) P Q -> RElim subrel R3 R4 (x1 = x2 /\ y1 = y2 /\ P) Q where ?A : [A : Type R1 : rel A A R2 : rel A A |- Type] ?B : [A : Type R1 : rel A A R2 : rel A A |- Type]
arrow_pointwise_relim : forall (R : rel ?B1 ?B2) (f : ?A -> ?B1) (g : ?A -> ?B2) (m n : ?A) (P Q : Prop), RElim R (f m) (g n) P Q -> RElim (- ==> R) f g (m = n /\ P) Q where ?A : [A : Type R1 : rel A A R2 : rel A A |- Type] ?B1 : [A : Type R1 : rel A A R2 : rel A A |- Type] ?B2 : [A : Type R1 : rel A A R2 : rel A A |- Type]
rel_inter_glb : forall R R3 R4 : rel ?A ?B, RIntro (subrel R R3 /\ subrel R R4) subrel R (R3 /\ R4)%rel where ?A : [A : Type R1 : rel A A R2 : rel A A |- Type] ?B : [A : Type R1 : rel A A R2 : rel A A |- Type]
arrow_relim : forall (RA : rel ?A1 ?A2) (RB : rel ?B1 ?B2) (f : ?A1 -> ?B1) (g : ?A2 -> ?B2) (m : ?A1) (n : ?A2) (P Q : Prop), RElim RB (f m) (g n) P Q -> RElim (RA ++> RB) f g (RA m n /\ P) Q where ?A1 : [A : Type R1 : rel A A R2 : rel A A |- Type] ?A2 : [A : Type R1 : rel A A R2 : rel A A |- Type] ?B1 : [A : Type R1 : rel A A R2 : rel A A |- Type] ?B2 : [A : Type R1 : rel A A R2 : rel A A |- Type]
rel_inter_rexists : forall (R3 R4 : rel ?A ?B) (x : ?A) (y : ?B), RExists (R3 x y /\ R4 x y) (R3 /\ R4) x y where ?A : [A : Type R1 : rel A A R2 : rel A A |- Type] ?B : [A : Type R1 : rel A A R2 : rel A A |- Type]
forallp_relim : forall (R : forall (x : ?V1) (x0 : ?V2), rel (?FV1 x) (?FV2 x0)) (f : forall x : ?V1, ?FV1 x) (g : forall x : ?V2, ?FV2 x) (v1 : ?V1) (v2 : ?V2) (P Q : Prop), RElim (R v1 v2) (f v1) (g v2) P Q ->...-> Type]
set_le = fun (A B : Type) (R : rel A B) (sA : A -> Prop) (sB : B -> Prop) => forall a : A, sA a -> exists b : B, sB b /\ R a b : forall A B : Type, rel A B -> rel (A -> Prop) (B -> Prop) Arguments set_le {A B}%type_scope _%rel_scope
set_ge = fun (A B : Type) (R : rel A B) (sA : A -> Prop) (sB : B -> Prop) => forall b : B, sB b -> exists a : A, sA a /\ R a b : forall A B : Type, rel A B -> rel (A -> Prop) (B -> Prop) Arguments set_ge {A B}%type_scope _%rel_scope
rdecompose : forall (x : ?A) (z : ?C), ?RAC x z -> exists y : ?B, ?RAB x y /\ ?RBC y z where ?A : [A : Type R1 : rel A A R2 : rel A A |- Type] ?B : [A : Type R1 : rel A A R2 : rel A A |- Type] ?C : [A : Type R1 : rel A A R2 : rel A A |- Type] ?RAB : [A : Type R1 : rel A A R2 : rel A A |- rel ?A ?B] ?RBC : [A : Type R1 : rel A A R2 : rel A A |- rel ?B ?C] ?RAC : [A : Type R1 : rel A A R2 : rel A A |- rel ?A ?C] ?RDecompose : [A : Type R1 : rel A A R2 : rel A A |- RDecompose ?RAB ?RBC ?RAC]
forall_rel : (forall (v1 : ?V1) (v2 : ?V2), ?E v1 v2 -> rel (?FV1 v1) (?FV2 v2)) -> rel (forall v1 : ?V1, ?FV1 v1) (forall v2 : ?V2, ?FV2 v2) where ?V1 : [A : Type R1 : rel A A R2 : rel A A |- Type] ?V2 : [A : Type R1 : rel A A R2 : rel A A |- Type] ?E : [A : Type R1 : rel A A R2 : rel A A |- ?V1 -> ?V2 -> Type] ?FV1 : [A : Type R1 : rel A A R2 : rel A A |- ?V1 -> Type] ?FV2 : [A : Type R1 : rel A A R2 : rel A A |- ?V2 -> Type]
rel_inter_subrel_rexists_l : forall R3 R4 R : rel ?A ?B, RExists (subrel R3 R) subrel (R3 /\ R4)%rel R where ?A : [A : Type R1 : rel A A R2 : rel A A |- Type] ?B : [A : Type R1 : rel A A R2 : rel A A |- Type]
rel_inter_subrel_rexists_r : forall R3 R4 R : rel ?A ?B, RExists (subrel R4 R) subrel (R3 /\ R4)%rel R where ?A : [A : Type R1 : rel A A R2 : rel A A |- Type] ?B : [A : Type R1 : rel A A R2 : rel A A |- Type]
rel_union_lub : forall R3 R4 R : rel ?A ?B, RIntro (subrel R3 R /\ subrel R4 R) subrel (R3 \/ R4)%rel R where ?A : [A : Type R1 : rel A A R2 : rel A A |- Type] ?B : [A : Type R1 : rel A A R2 : rel A A |- Type]
RDecompose = fun (A B C : Type) (RAB : rel A B) (RBC : rel B C) (RAC : rel A C) => forall (x : A) (z : C), RAC x z -> exists y : B, RAB x y /\ RBC y z : forall A B C : Type, rel A B -> rel B C -> rel A C -> Prop Arguments RDecompose {A B C}%type_scope (_ _ _)%rel_scope
forall_pointwise_rel : (forall v : ?V, rel (?FV1 v) (?FV2 v)) -> rel (forall v : ?V, ?FV1 v) (forall v : ?V, ?FV2 v) where ?V : [A : Type R1 : rel A A R2 : rel A A |- Type] ?FV1 : [A : Type R1 : rel A A R2 : rel A A |- ?V -> Type] ?FV2 : [A : Type R1 : rel A A R2 : rel A A |- ?V -> Type]
rexists : (PolarityResolved ?R -> ?R ?m ?n) -> ?R ?m ?n where ?A : [A : Type R1 : rel A A R2 : rel A A |- Type] ?B : [A : Type R1 : rel A A R2 : rel A A |- Type] ?R : [A : Type R1 : rel A A R2 : rel A A |- rel ?A ?B] ?m : [A : Type R1 : rel A A R2 : rel A A |- ?A] ?n : [A : Type R1 : rel A A R2 : rel A A |- ?B]
forall_relim : forall (R : forall (x : ?V1) (x0 : ?V2), ?E x x0 -> rel (?FV1 x) (?FV2 x0)) (f : forall x : ?V1, ?FV1 x) (g : forall x : ?V2, ?FV2 x) (v1 : ?V1) (v2 : ?V2) (e : ?E v1 v2) (P Q : Prop), RElim (R v1 v2 e) (f v1) (g v2) P Q -> RElim (forallr e @ v1 v2, R v1 v2 e) f g P Q where ?V1 : [A : Type R1 : rel A A R2 : rel A A |- Type] ?V2 : [A : Type R1 : rel A A R2 : rel A A |- Type] ?E : [A : Type R1 : rel A A R2 : rel A A |- ?V1 -> ?V2 ->...-> Type]
forallp_rel : rel ?V1 ?V2 -> forall (FV1 : ?V1 -> Type) (FV2 : ?V2 -> Type), (forall (v1 : ?V1) (v2 : ?V2), rel (FV1 v1) (FV2 v2)) -> rel (forall v1 : ?V1, FV1 v1) (forall v2 : ?V2, FV2 v2) where ?V1 : [A : Type R1 : rel A A R2 : rel A A |- Type] ?V2 : [A : Type R1 : rel A A R2 : rel A A |- Type]
rdestruct : forall (m : ?Goal0 * ?Goal1) (n : ?Goal2 * ?Goal3), (?RA * ?RB)%rel m n ->...-> P m n where ?Goal0 : [A : Type R1 : rel A A R2 : rel A A |- Type] ?Goal1 : [A : Type R1 : rel A A R2 : rel A A |- Type] ?Goal2 : [A : Type R1 : rel A A R2 : rel A A |- Type] ?Goal3 : [A : Type R1 : rel A A R2 : rel A A |- Type] ?RA : [A : Type R1 : rel A A R2 : rel A A |- rel ?Goal0 ?Goal2] ?RB : [A : Type R1 : rel A A R2 : rel A A |- rel ?Goal1 ?Goal3]
forall_rintro : forall (FE : forall (x : ?V1) (y : ?V2), ?E x y -> rel (?F1 x) (?F2 y)) (f : forall x : ?V1, ?F1 x) (g : forall x : ?V2, ?F2 x), RIntro (forall (u : ?V1) (v : ?V2) (e : ?E u v), FE u v e (f u) (g v)) (forallr e @ v1 v2, FE v1 v2 e) f g where ?V1 : [A : Type R1 : rel A A R2 : rel A A |- Type] ?V2 : [A : Type R1 : rel A A R2 : rel A A |- Type] ?E : [A : Type R1 : rel A A R2 : rel A A |- ?V1 -> ?V2 -> Type] ?F1 : [A : Type R1 : rel A A R2 : rel A A |- ?V1 ->...-> Type]
set_ge_subrel = fun (A B : Type) (x y : rel A B) (H : subrel x y) (x0 : A -> Prop) (y0 : B -> Prop) (H0 : set_ge x x0 y0) (b : B) (H1 : y0 b) => (fun H2 : y0 b -> exists a : A, x0 a /\ x a b => (fun H3 : exists a : A, x0 a /\ x a b => ex_ind (fun (x1 : A) (H4 : x0 x1 /\ x x1 b) => and_ind (fun (H5 : x0 x1) (H6 : x x1 b) => ex_intro (fun a : A => x0 a /\ y a b) x1 (conj H5 ((fun _ : forall y1 : B, x x1 y1 -> y x1 y1 => H x1 b H6) (H x1)))) H4) H3) (H2 H1)) (H0 b) : forall A B : Type, Monotonic set_ge (sub...
arrow_rintro : forall (RA : rel ?A1 ?A2) (RB : rel ?B1 ?B2) (f : ?A1 -> ?B1) (g : ?A2 -> ?B2), RIntro (forall (x : ?A1) (y : ?A2), RA x y -> RB (f x) (g y)) (RA ++> RB) f g where ?A1 : [A : Type R1 : rel A A R2 : rel A A |- Type] ?A2 : [A : Type R1 : rel A A R2 : rel A A |- Type] ?B1 : [A : Type R1 : rel A A R2 : rel A A |- Type] ?B2 : [A : Type R1 : rel A A R2 : rel A A |- Type]
prod_rel_sym : forall (R3 : rel ?A ?A) (R4 : rel ?B ?B), Symmetric R3 -> Symmetric R4 -> Symmetric (R3 * R4) where ?A : [A : Type R1 : rel A A R2 : rel A A |- Type] ?B : [A : Type R1 : rel A A R2 : rel A A |- Type]
sum_rel_refl : forall (R3 : rel ?A ?A) (R4 : rel ?B ?B), Reflexive R3 -> Reflexive R4 -> Reflexive (R3 + R4) where ?A : [A : Type R1 : rel A A R2 : rel A A |- Type] ?B : [A : Type R1 : rel A A R2 : rel A A |- Type]
sum_rel_preorder : forall (R3 : rel ?A ?A) (R4 : rel ?B ?B), PreOrder R3 -> PreOrder R4 -> PreOrder (R3 + R4) where ?A : [A : Type R1 : rel A A R2 : rel A A |- Type] ?B : [A : Type R1 : rel A A R2 : rel A A |- Type]
prod_rel_trans : forall (R3 : rel ?A ?A) (R4 : rel ?B ?B), Transitive R3 -> Transitive R4 -> Transitive (R3 * R4) where ?A : [A : Type R1 : rel A A R2 : rel A A |- Type] ?B : [A : Type R1 : rel A A R2 : rel A A |- Type]
prod_rel_preorder : forall (R3 : rel ?A ?A) (R4 : rel ?B ?B), PreOrder R3 -> PreOrder R4 -> PreOrder (R3 * R4) where ?A : [A : Type R1 : rel A A R2 : rel A A |- Type] ?B : [A : Type R1 : rel A A R2 : rel A A |- Type]

```  
intros A R2 R1 H x y Hxy.
unfold Coreflexive in *.
intros Hxy2.
apply H in Hxy2.
apply H in Hxy.
rewrite Hxy.
rewrite Hxy2.
reflexivity.
```

original: intros A R2 R1 H x y Hxy. unfold Coreflexive in *. intros Hxy2. apply H in Hxy2. apply H in Hxy. rewrite Hxy. rewrite Hxy2. reflexivity.
